alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Scott County; Northern Polk County Higher Elevations; Polk County Lower Elevations; Southeast Polk County Higher Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 4:43PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Scott and northern Polk Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 442 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Polk County Fairgrounds, or near Mena, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mena... Beauchamp... Queen Wilhelmina State Park... Mountain Fork... Polk County Fairgrounds... Mena Intermountain Airport... Acorn... Black Fork... Rocky... Black Fork Mountain Wilderness... Ink... Y City... Rich Mountain... Needmore... Cherry Hill in Polk County... Potter... Boles... Eagleton... Shady Grove... Camp Pioneer... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for western Arkansas.
